name: GetFileVersionRetentions
description:
Retrieve file version retentions for an enterprise.

Retrieves all file version retentions for a specified enterprise. Note that this API is deprecated; consider using newer alternatives for files and file versions under retention.

parameters.name: filter_by_file_id
parameters.description: Filters results to include only files with this specific file ID.

value_schema.description: Filters results by files with this ID.

parameters.name: filter_by_file_version_id
parameters.description: Filters results by file versions matching this ID.

value_schema.description: Filters results by file versions with this ID.

parameters.name: retention_policy_id
parameters.description: Filter results by the specific retention policy ID.

value_schema.description: Filters results by the retention policy with this ID.

parameters.name: filter_by_disposition_action
parameters.description: Filter results based on the retention policy's disposition action, such as 'permanently_delete' or 'remove_retention'.

value_schema.description:
Filters results by the retention policy with this disposition
action.

parameters.name: filter_by_disposition_before_date
parameters.description: Provide a date to filter results by files that will have their disposition come into effect before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description:
Filters results by files that will have their disposition
come into effect before this date.

parameters.name: disposition_effective_after_date
parameters.description: Filter results by files with disposition effective after this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-10-01').

value_schema.description:
Filters results by files that will have their disposition
come into effect after this date.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Defines the starting point for paginated results using a position marker. Requires marker-based pagination to be enabled.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: Filters results by files with this ID.

value_schema.description: Filters results by files with this ID.

parameters.name: file_version_id
parameters.description: Filters results by file versions with this ID.

value_schema.description: Filters results by file versions with this ID.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: Filters results by the retention policy with this ID.

value_schema.description: Filters results by the retention policy with this ID.

parameters.name: disposition_action
parameters.description:
Filters results by the retention policy with this disposition
action.

value_schema.description:
Filters results by the retention policy with this disposition
action.

parameters.name: disposition_before
parameters.description:
Filters results by files that will have their disposition
come into effect before this date.

value_schema.description:
Filters results by files that will have their disposition
come into effect before this date.

parameters.name: disposition_after
parameters.description:
Filters results by files that will have their disposition
come into effect after this date.

value_schema.description:
Filters results by files that will have their disposition
come into effect after this date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
